SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightTableRelated

Class LightLobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightTableRelated.LightLobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
Differentiable, Observed, Serializable
public class LightLobby extends Object implements Differentiable, Observed
This class represents the lobby in the View. It holds the list of nicknames of the players in the lobby, the name of the lobby and the number of players needed to start the game.
See Also:
